description: This is a startup script for MongoDB that performs checks, starts the server, creates users, and outputs configuration details.

methods.name: mongosh
methods.description: MongoDB shell used to execute database commands and user creation scripts.

methods.name: pgrep
methods.description: Process grep used to find running mongod process.

methods.name: lsof
methods.description: Lists open files for the mongod process to find the listening port.

methods.name: pkill
methods.description: Kills the mongod process if needed.

methods.name: cat
methods.description: Reads files and outputs their contents.
